response.overview: Young businessman Thomas Crown is bored and decides to plan a robbery and assigns a professional agent with the right information to the job. However, Crown is soon betrayed yet cannot blow his cover because he’s in love.
response.tagline: How do you get the man who has everything?
response.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
